participant_1.background:
I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it.
I remember spending hours in my room reading books while my dad worked.
I'm not worried about the weather because I have to be ready for any condition when I fly.
My car is a convertible, so I can enjoy the sun and the wind in my hair while listening to my favorite music.
I'm afraid of not being able to make my juicing bar a success.

participant_2.background:
I love going on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
i have been married five times.
i escaped and later became a carpenter.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

content.text: Hey! I'm a flight attendant and I love riding my bike in the woods. What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love riding my bike in the woods too! I don't tell my parents though, because they worry about me getting hurt.
That's understandable! It can be dangerous, but it's so much fun.
I know, right? I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
Me too! I'm also really into yoga. I go to classes a few times a week.
That's awesome! I used to do yoga, but I haven't been in a while. I should really get back into it.
You should! It's so good for you.
I know, I know! I'll try to find a class near my house.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a carpenter. I build houses and other things out of wood.
That's cool! I've always been impressed by people who can build things.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, but it can be hard work.
I bet! But it's worth it when you see the finished product.
Definitely!
So, what's your favorite thing about being a carpenter?
I love being able to create something with my hands. It's really satisfying to see something come together from nothing.
I can imagine! I'm always amazed by what people can create with their hands.
Me too!
So, what's your dream project?
I'd love to build a house from the ground up.
That would be amazing! I'm sure it would be a lot of work, but it would be so rewarding.
Definitely! I've been thinking about it for a while, but I'm not sure if I'll ever have the time to do it.
You never know! You might be surprised at what you can accomplish.
I hope so!
I'm sure you will
